alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Henderson; McLean (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 3:53PM EDT until July 01 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Daviess County in northwestern Kentucky... Southeastern Henderson County in northwestern Kentucky... Northwestern McLean County in northwestern Kentucky... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 253 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Robards, or 8 miles southeast of Henderson, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Henderson, Robards, St. Joseph, Stanley and Hebbardsville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 137 and 148. Audubon Parkway between Mile Markers 1 and 19. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
